name: Octane in Unreal Engine
description:
A partial re-make of Octane from Apex Legends, in Unreal Engine 4 with (what I think is) a better jumppad! 

The  demo includes:

Jump charging, Camera bobbing, Camera Swaying, various UI elements and effects,  Stim Tactical, Swiftmend (1.5 hps) and the Jumppad.
